description: Search for emails in a specific mailbox.
Search for emails that have attachments.
Search for emails received before a specific date.
Search for emails received after a specific date.
Search for emails from a specific sender.
Search for emails with specific text in the subject.
Search for emails older than a duration (e.g., 7d, 2w, 1m, 1y). Supports d, w, month, y and Go's time.ParseDuration format (e.g. 24h, 720h).
Search for emails newer than a duration (e.g., 7d, 2w, 1m, 1y). Supports d, w, month, y and Go's time.ParseDuration format (e.g. 24h, 720h).
